mapper.insert: insert into comments (c_no, m_no, m_name, h_no, c_content) values (comments_seq.nextval, #{m_no}, #{m_name}, #{h_no}, #{c_content})
mapper.update: update comments set c_content = #{c_content}, c_modifydate=sysdate where c_no=#{c_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where c_no=#{c_no}
select c_no, m_no, m_name, h_no, c_content, c_regdate, c_modifydate from comments where h_no=#{h_no} order by c_no desc
